Get count of all edges in the graph

From a graph object of class dgr_graph, get a count of edges in the graph.

count_edges(graph)

Arguments

graph

a graph object of class dgr_graph.

Value

a numeric vector of single length.

Examples

# Create a graph with a
# path of nodes and 3
# unconnected nodes
graph <-
  create_graph() %>%
  add_path(n = 3) %>%
  add_n_nodes(n = 3)

# Get a count of all edges
# in the graph
graph %>%
  count_edges()
#> [1] 2

Contents

  • Value
